statements: SELECT * FROM compost_logs
SELECT log_time, action_type FROM compost_logs WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT description FROM compost_logs WHERE log_time >= '2021-01-01' AND log_time <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT log_time, user_id FROM compost_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS average_user_id FROM compost_logs
SELECT log_id, log_time, description FROM compost_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, action_type, user_id FROM compost_logs WHERE log_time >= '2021-01-01' AND log_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM compost_logs WHERE action_type = 'INSERT' OR action_type = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, description FROM compost_logs WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY user_id, log_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action_type FROM compost_logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01' AND description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_log;
SELECT actor_name, log_date FROM compost_log WHERE amendment_type = 'Watering';
SELECT id, activity_description, actor_name FROM compost_log WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulatory_entity = 'EPA' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulatory_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulatory_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compost_log WHERE actor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT log_date, activity_description FROM compost_log WHERE amendment_type = 'Nitrogen';
SELECT actor_name, log_date FROM compost_log ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM compost_log;
SELECT regulatory_entity, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulatory_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compost_log;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_description FROM compost_log WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT additive_name, quantity FROM additives WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT amendment_type, date_added FROM amendments ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_description FROM compost_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT additive_name, quantity FROM additives WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY additive_name ASC;
SELECT amendment_id, amendment_type, date_added FROM amendments WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_description FROM compost_log WHERE event_description LIKE '%rain%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compost_log JOIN additives ON compost_log.log_id = additives.additive_id WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM compost_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action FROM compost_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, description FROM compost_logs WHERE action = 'add';
SELECT name, description FROM additives WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM compost_logs WHERE action = 'turning' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description FROM compost_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, name FROM additives WHERE description LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM amendments WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND name <> 'organic' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE details LIKE '%composting%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM compost_logs;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM compost_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT bin_number, location FROM compost_bins WHERE location = 'Backyard';
SELECT additive_id, name FROM additives WHERE name ILIKE 'brown%';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM compost_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM compost_logs WHERE action = 'turned' AND details LIKE '%healthy%';
SELECT c.log_id, c.timestamp, c.action, a.name AS additive_name FROM compost_logs c JOIN additives a ON c.log_id = a.additive_id;
SELECT u.username, c.timestamp, c.action, b.location FROM compost_logs c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN compost_bins b ON c.bin_id = b.bin_id ORDER BY c.timestamp DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.timestamp, c.action, am.name AS amendment_name, am.effect AS amendment_effect FROM compost_logs c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN amendments am ON c.amendment_id = am.amendment_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
